Detailed Description

Helper class for getting controller information between properties.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum DzControllerHelper::ControllerDirection

The direction of the controller (top down or bottom up)

Enumerator:
CD_TopDown 

Indicates that links are in a top-down direction

CD_BottomUp 

Indicates that links are in a bottom-up direction

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzControllerHelper::DzControllerHelper ( bool  initData = true  ) 

Creates a new instance of this class

Parameters:
initData If true, initializes the data for all controllers in the scene

Member Function Documentation

DzERCLink * DzControllerHelper::getERCLink ( DzProperty *  master,
DzProperty *  slave 
) [static]
Returns:
slave's ERC controller that has the same property as master. If either parameter is null, or controlled prop does not have a controller that has the same property as master, a null pointer is returned.
Parameters:
slave The property whose controller will be returned
master The property to determine which controller is returned.
DzFormulaController * DzControllerHelper::getFormulaController ( DzProperty *  master,
DzProperty *  slave 
) [static]
Returns:
slave's formula controller that has the same property as master. If either parameter is null, or controlled prop does not have a controller that has the same property as master, a null pointer is returned.
Parameters:
slave The property whose controller will be returned
master The property to determine which controller is returned.

DzPropertyList &  linkProps,
ControllerDirection  dir 
) [slot]

Gets the links for the given property in the given direction

Parameters:
prop The property to get links for

dir The direction in which to get links
bool DzControllerHelper::hasLink ( DzProperty *  prop,
DzProperty *  linkProp,
ControllerDirection  dir 
) [slot]
Parameters:
prop The property to test for a link
linkProp The property link to test
dir The direction of the link to test
Returns:
true if a link exists betwen prop and linkProp in the given direction
void DzControllerHelper::refreshData (  )  [slot]

Refreshes the data. This shold be called whenever it is suspected that the information may have changed

void DzControllerHelper::setData ( DzNodeList &  nodes,
bool  initData = true 
) [slot]

Sets up this object to provide controller information for the given nodes

Parameters:
nodes The nodes to get information for
initData If true, then the controller information will be populated immediately. If false, then DzControllerHelper::refreshData() must be called before this class is usable

bool  initData = true 
) [slot]

initData If true, then the controller information will be populated immediately. If false, then DzControllerHelper::refreshData() must be called before this class is usable

bool  initData = true 
) [slot]

Sets up this object to provide controller information for the given properties

Parameters:

void DzControllerHelper::setData ( bool  initData = true  )  [slot]

Sets up this object to provide controller information for the entire scene

Parameters:
initData If true, then the controller information will be populated immediately. If false, then DzControllerHelper::refreshData() must be called before this class is usable
